name: |Doom Dungeons|
description:
!! Full screen NOT recommended on lower devices !! 

Instructions [MUST read to win the game]:

WAD or Arrow keys to move!

S or down-arrow key to crouch!

Space key to jump higher!

R key to reset the level!

N key to go to the Next level!

P key to go the previous level!

Credits:

Gitbo for the amazing Dungeon assets!

Made in Godot Game Engine!

Have Fun!!
